# Octree

> Octree is an AI-powered LaTeX editor that helps researchers, students, and professionals write, edit, and compile LaTeX documents faster.

## About

Octree is a modern, cloud-based LaTeX editor with built-in AI capabilities. It combines a full-featured LaTeX editing environment with intelligent AI assistance for writing, error fixing, and document generation. The editor is available at https://www.useoctree.com.

## Features

- **AI-Powered Editing Agent**: Edit documents with an AI agent similar to Cursor, but built for academics. Refactor entire projects with simple commands.
- **Fast PDF Preview**: Real-time LaTeX compilation with instant PDF preview.
- **AI Error Detection & Fixes**: One-click fixes for complex LaTeX compilation errors. Intelligent error detection eliminates manual debugging.
- **Document Generation**: Generate professionally formatted academic papers, presentations, and resumes from AI prompts.
- **Research Paper Generation**: Transform ideas into professionally formatted academic papers with citations and equations handled automatically.
- **Beamer Presentations**: Build stunning Beamer presentations with AI assistance for conferences and lectures.
- **Resume Builder**: Generate polished, ATS-friendly resumes using industry-standard LaTeX templates.
- **Image to LaTeX**: Convert images containing math or tables into LaTeX code.
- **Cloud Sync**: Unlimited projects and files synced across all devices.
- **AI Chat Assistant**: Built-in chat for fixing errors, improving writing, and restructuring documents.

## Use Cases

- Academic research paper writing
- Conference and lecture presentations (Beamer)
- Professional resume and CV creation
- Thesis and dissertation formatting
- Technical documentation
- Homework and assignment typesetting

## Pricing

- **Free Tier**: Available with limited AI features.
- **Octree Pro**: $9.99/month or $4.99/week for unlimited AI features and priority support.
